Program_Policies: A grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor, as specified by Senate Policy 59-10. In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).; At least 6 credits must be taken at the 400 level.; At least 3 credits must involve supervised field experience and 3-6 credits must be public issues and democracy courses.
